hook.text: In 1816, Europe had no summer. Snow fell in June. Crops failed across the continent.

buildup.text: The cause was Mount Tambora in Indonesia, which erupted the year before.

discovery.text: Ash and sulfur injected into the stratosphere reflected sunlight back to space.

twist.text: Global temperatures dropped by 3 Â°C. Famine spread worldwide.

climax.text: The gloomy weather inspired Mary Shelley to write Frankenstein indoors.

punchline.text: A volcano erased summer. A bored writer created Frankenstein.
